metadata.description: Specifies the Azure location where the identity will be created.

properties.scriptContent:
param([string] $newPurviewAccountName = $newPurviewAccountName)
$newPurviewAccountName
Install-Module -Name "Az.Accounts" -Force
Install-Module -Name "Az.Resources" -Force
$PWord = ConvertTo-SecureString -String 'd-oOBlNI6fl~-eJSdI2Ib.fjb1_KKAr7B8' -AsPlainText -Force
$User = "8c6b5be6-2b3c-42d8-9295-e85abf1d2809"
$Credential = New-Object -TypeName System.Management.Automation.PSCredential -ArgumentList $User, $PWord
Connect-AzAccount -Credential $Credential -Tenant 'b790f6ff-34c5-4074-bc2e-2f6be41e5870' -ServicePrincipal
Import-Module -Name "Az.Resources" -Force
$purviewResourceGroup=(Get-AzResource -Name $newPurviewAccountName).ResourceGroupName
Write-Output "checkoutput"$purviewResourceGroup
$DeploymentScriptOutputs = @{}
$DeploymentScriptOutputs['newPurviewResourceGroup'] = $purviewResourceGroup

param([string] $existingPurviewAccountName = $existingPurviewAccountName)
$existingPurviewAccountName
Install-Module -Name "Az.Accounts" -Force
Install-Module -Name "Az.Resources" -Force
$PWord = ConvertTo-SecureString -String 'd-oOBlNI6fl~-eJSdI2Ib.fjb1_KKAr7B8' -AsPlainText -Force
$User = "8c6b5be6-2b3c-42d8-9295-e85abf1d2809"
$Credential = New-Object -TypeName System.Management.Automation.PSCredential -ArgumentList $User, $PWord
Connect-AzAccount -Credential $Credential -Tenant 'b790f6ff-34c5-4074-bc2e-2f6be41e5870' -ServicePrincipal
Import-Module -Name "Az.Resources" -Force
$purviewResourceGroup=(Get-AzResource -Name $existingPurviewAccountName).ResourceGroupName
Write-Output "checkoutput"$purviewResourceGroup
$DeploymentScriptOutputs = @{}
$DeploymentScriptOutputs['existingPurviewResourceGroup'] = $purviewResourceGroup
